about_the_game:
Immortal Empire is a multiplayer tactics role playing game. Control a party of up to 5 immortals as you travel through a unique fantasy world, using spells and strategy to defeat your enemies.

The Starter Pack 1 gives access to 4 locked character classes along with 500 premium in-game currency. This bundle is much cheaper than buying immortals individually and gives some in-game currency to spend as you wish. This pack is ideal for players just starting out that want to try a few different immortals.

Included in this pack:
  • Immortal Pack 1 - Berserker, Summoner, Treant, Phoenix Mage
  • 500 Radiance (premium currency).
detailed_description:
Immortal Empire is a multiplayer tactics role playing game. Control a party of up to 5 immortals as you travel through a unique fantasy world, using spells and strategy to defeat your enemies.

The Starter Pack 1 gives access to 4 locked character classes along with 500 premium in-game currency. This bundle is much cheaper than buying immortals individually and gives some in-game currency to spend as you wish. This pack is ideal for players just starting out that want to try a few different immortals.

Included in this pack:
  • Immortal Pack 1 - Berserker, Summoner, Treant, Phoenix Mage
  • 500 Radiance (premium currency).
legal_notice:
Immortal Empire Terms of Use Agreement

For the purposes of this agreement "Tactic" shall refer to "Tactic Studios", "The Game" shall refer to "Immortal Empire", which is composed of two elements: (a) the game server or "Server" hosted and operated by Tactic, and (b) the game client or "Client" that runs on your personal computer.

1. Grant of a Limited License

Subject to your agreement of and adherence to this terms of use agreement, you are granted a license to use the Game. You agree that you will not:

(a) use the Game for any commercial purpose, or any purpose other than for entertainment;

(b) use any form of cheat, hack, exploit, unauthorized third-party software, or modification of the software in conjunction with the Game;

(c) provide any unauthorized means to play the Game, including but not limited to alternative servers, or matchmaking services;

(d) disrupt the Game in any way, including but not limited to the Servers, the Client, or the experiences of other players.

(e) violate any law or regulation through your use of the Game.

2. Eligibility

You agree that you have the right to bind yourself to this agreement in your country of residence, or that you may bind a minor for whom you are a parent or guardian on his or her behalf.

3. Ownership

All title, ownership rights, and intellectual property with respect to the Game including but not limited to, user accounts, text, images, sounds, and music, are the sole property of Tactic or its collaborators.

4. User Accounts

Tactic reserves the right to suspend, delete, or modify user accounts at its sole discretion for any reason without notice.

5. Indemnity

Tactic shall not be held liable in any way for any loss, damage, injury, cost or expense as a result of the Game or any use of the Game, including but not limited to loss of characters, virtual goods, accounts, rankings, loss of data, or computer malfunction. You further agree that Tactic is not responsible for interruptions of service to the Game, including but not limited to failure to connect to the Server, inability to access any part of the Game due to an error or bug, or degraded user experience due to poor performance or latency. You hereby agree to indemnify and hold Tactic harmless from any loss, claim, liability, damage or expense incurred by Tactic from your use of the Game.

6. Termination

Tactic may terminate this agreement at any time in its sole discretion for any reason without notice.

7. Changes to this agreement or the Game

Tactic reserves the right to change the contents of this agreement or the contents of the Game at any time in its sole discretion.
name: Immortal Empire - Starter Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 650 (1GB memory)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 768 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 Quad core 3.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 750 (2GB memory)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 768 MB available space

short_description: The Starter Pack 1 unlocks 4 character classes for Immortal Empire, a multiplayer tactics role-playing game.
